_sText:
Decided to go a bit out of my comfort zone and create a different looking kind of map. 

Map is 20-30 seconds long, the bonus teleport is at the end of the map. Bonus isn't anything special but was trying to do something a bit different.

Also, the map should be optimized, on CSS I was getting 230-300 FPS around the map and around 160-200 on Gmod, my PC is fairly bad so it should be good for everyone.

Thanks and enjoy!
